Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Observations Log A event types Order Received Order Validated Payment Processed Item Shipped Item Delivered Log B event names OrderReceived OrderValidation PaymentCheck Quality Check Shipping

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: compute time differences A1 vs B1 difference 2 seconds A2 vs B2 1 second A3 vs B3 5 seconds A4 vs B5 2 seconds

Name: Inductive Reasoning - IND
Text: Log A timestamps may reflect time events are received not when they started so Log A timestamps might be later than Log B

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Payment Processed in A corresponds to PaymentCheck in B despite 5 second difference because name similarity sequence position and only payment related events

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: use tolerance of 5 seconds inclusive because maximum difference among matching pairs is 5 seconds small relative to inter event gaps of 30 seconds or more

Name: Validation - PE
Text: validate matches no risk of mismatching unrelated events as other differences too large and sequence preserved

Name: Backtracking - IND
Text: consider strict 2 seconds tolerance then A3 B3 not matched leading to two separate payment events which seems incorrect

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: propose merged schema with primary timestamp from Log A both timestamps both event names user id resource id notes origin indicator
